## Exercise 2 

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

finches <- read.csv(
"D:/R_scripts/my_book/book_ggplot2/data/Chapter06/kenya_finches.csv", 
  header = TRUE)

ggplot(finches, aes(x= species, y = beaklength)) + 
  geom_violin(aes(color = species, fill = species),
      linewidth = 0.8, alpha = 0.2, adjust = 1.5) + 
  geom_jitter (color = "gray2", fill = "gray70", shape = 21,
      position=position_jitter(0), size = 2) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#56B4E9", "#E69F00","#009E73")) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#56B4E9D0", "#E69F00D0","#009E73D0")) + 
  annotate("text",x = 0.6, y = 8.5,
      label = "Crimson-rumped \nwaxbill",
      size = 13/.pt,color = "#56B4E9", hjust = 0) + 
  annotate("text",x = 1.6, y = 9,
      label = "Cutthroat \nfinch",
      size = 13/.pt,color = "#E69F00", hjust = 0) +
  annotate("text",x = 2, y = 11.3,
      label = "White-browed \nsparrow weaver",
      size = 13/.pt,color = "#009E73", hjust = 0) +
  ylab("Beak length (mm)") + 
  theme_us_classic() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(), 
        axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), 
        axis.title.x = element_blank(), 
        legend.position = "none")


```
